definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: (= [[אוּלָם]]), q.v.; only Ez, where Co always for [[אוּלָם]], cf. LXX ai)lam; Bö:NÄ 929; makes [[אילם]] vestibule, [[אולם]] porch)—[[אֵילָם]] rd. for [[אֵילִים]] Ez Eze 40:37 (so Sm Co); sf. [[אילמו]] Kt Ez Eze 40:22, Eze 40:22 + 4 t. (Qr [[אֵילַמָּיו]]) + Eze 41:15 Co (for MT [[אֻלַמֵּי]]); [[אלמו]] Kt Ez Eze 40:21 + 6 t. (Qr [[אֵלַמָּיו]]).—Co all sg.:—pl. [[אֵלַמּוֹת]] Ez Eze 40:16 (Co sg.) v:Eze 40:30 (del. Co cf. MSS. of HCT, B etc., also Ew Hi Sm).—porch, of Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 40:16, Eze 40:21 + 13 t.
